name: Ex Flying Car Driving
description:
Want to drive fast through long streets of the city? Fly high in the sky above the city? What if you can enjoy both at the same time? Your wait is over and now get straight into the action that is the flying race car simulator!

Get behind the steering wheel of a highly modified racing car. Perform amazing amazing aerial flips and tricks

Features;
- Futuristic flying car models
- Realistic and dynamic car and flying physics
- Huge immersive city environment
- Highly modified car models
- Cutting edge 3D graphics
